original: vināsaṃ pāpeti. Kathaṃ? Byaggho sañjīviko yathāti, yathā sañjīvena māṇavena mantaṃ
analyzed: vināsam pāpa iti katham byagghaḥ sañjīvikaḥ yathā ati yathā sañjīvena māṇavena

original: parivattetvā matabyaggho sañjīviko jīvitasampadānena sampaggahito attano jīvitadāyakaṃ
analyzed: parivattetvā matabyagghaḥ sañjīvikaḥ jīvita sampadānena sampaggahitaḥ attanaḥ jīvita dāyakam

original: sañjīvameva jīvitā voropetvā tattheva pātesi, evaṃ aññopi yo asantapaggahaṃ karoti,
analyzed: sañjīvam eva jīvitā voropetvā tattha iva pātesi evam aññaḥ api yaḥ asanta paggaham karoti

original: so dussīlo taṃ attano sampaggāhakameva vināseti. Evaṃ asantasampaggāhakā vināsaṃ pāpuṇantīti.
analyzed: saḥ dussīlaḥ tam attanaḥ sampaggāhakam eva vināseti evam asanta sampaggāhakāḥ vināsam pāpuṇanti iti

original: Bodhisatto imāya gāthāya māṇavānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
analyzed: bodhisattaḥ imāya gāthāya māṇavānam dhammam desetvā dāna ādīni puññāni katvā yathākammam gataḥ

original: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā matabyagghuṭṭhāpanako māṇavo ajātasattu ahosi, disāpāmokkho ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
analyzed: satthā imam dhamma desanam āharitvā jātakam samodhānesi tadā matabyagghuṭṭhāpanakaḥ māṇavaḥ ajātasattu ahosi disāpāmokkhaḥ ācariyaḥ pana aham eva ahosinti

original: Sañjīvajātakavaṇṇanā dasamā.
analyzed: sañjīva jātaka vaṇṇanā dasamā

original: Kakaṇṭakavaggo pannarasamo.
analyzed: kakaṇṭaka vaggaḥ pannarasamaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṃ –
analyzed: tassa uddānam

original: Godhasiṅgālavirocaṃ, naṅguṭṭharādhakākañca;
analyzed: godha siṅgāla virocam naṅguṭṭha rādha kākam ca

original: Puppharattañca siṅgālaṃ, ekapaṇṇañca sañjīvaṃ.
analyzed: puppha rattam ca siṅgālam eka paṇṇam ca sañjīvam

original: Atha vagguddānaṃ –
analyzed: atha vagguddānam

original: Apaṇṇako sīlavaggo, kuruṅgo ca kulāvako;
analyzed: apaṇṇakaḥ sīlavaggo kuruṅgo ca kulāvako

original: Atthakāmo ca āsīso, itthīvaruṇapāyimhā.
analyzed: attha kāmo ca āsīsaḥ itthī varuṇa pāyimhā

original: Litto parosataṃ haṃci, kusanāḷā sampadāno;
analyzed: littaḥ haṃci kusanāḷā sampadānaḥ

original: Kakaṇṭako pannarasa, satapaṇṇāsa jātakāti.
analyzed: kakaṇṭakaḥ pannarasa satapaṇṇāsa

original: Ekakanipātavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekaka nipāta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (Paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito).
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ bhāgaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ
